title: Help finding font or similar
content:
Hello im trying to identify this font or find something similar to work with.

Thanks,  
J

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819184003im_/http:/typophile.com/files/what%20is%20this%20font_4012.jpg)
author: designjacob

comments.content: Thanks for the font suggestion just found out the original is custom made by SATURDAY

More information on Industria [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819184003/http:/www.typophile.com/node/77367#comment-444953).  
Alternatives: [Big Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819184003/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/carter_and_cone/big_caslon/) (previously mentioned), [Freight Big](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819184003/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/garagefonts/freight-big-pro/)
